! Holy Elmoreden Solin: My spirit is weak, too long a time, I was imprisoned in this place ... I'm afraid that I can not know all the details of the current situation. But I do know that JWoodith and his organization are associated with the appearance of the dark forces of Shilen. If you could not stop them and protect the seven seals, the world will never return to our land! [Quest _10295_SevenSignsSolinasTomb solina_q10295_8.htm|Ask what to do]
